name: Colony Master
description:
"Colony Master" is a first-person resource gathering game where you have to build colonies. You start on a island and your main purpose is to complete your journal's quests, which is establishing a colony. Currently this is a demo version.

Controls

  • WASD : Movement
  • 1 : Pickaxe Tool
  • 2 : Axe Tool
  • 3 : ShovelTool
  • 4 : No Tool
  • Left-Click : Use Tool
  • Shift : Sprint
  • Space : Jump
  • Tab : Journal
  • E : Build Area Menu & Marketplace Menu
  • ESC : Pause Menu

This is my second game and it took a bit longer but at the end, it's another step into getting more experience.
